## Application.(constructor)

Create an application with the given configuration and parent context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(config?: ApplicationConfig, parent?: Context);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | <code>ApplicationConfig</code> | Application configuration |
|  parent | <code>Context</code> | Parent context |
